channel.title: browser on Servator
channel.description: Recent content in browser on Servator

item.title: Side channels in web browsers
item.description: I’ve been away from web browsers for some time now, but after the recent CSS Prime+Probe, SMASH, and Stephen RÃ¶ttger’s spectre PoC I couldn’t help myself and had to spend some time catching up. Kudos to everyone involved! :) First, I’m super happy to see that my work on replacement policies was justified, both SMASH and the Spectre PoC make super cool use of them, that’s something I’ve been expecting for some time now, and I’m pretty sure we’ll see more of these tricks to squeeze caches.
